description:
Submission to seek approval for Bringing into use Crossrail scheduled work numbers: 
 3/17A - A railway (1,500 metres inlength), commencing by a junction with the Reading railwy at a point 54 metres east of London Underground bridge No.D29 over that railway, passing eastwards and terminating by a junction with the Poplar Lines 5 metres west of the bridge carrying Horn Lane over those lines.
 3/17B - A railway (881 metres in length) forming sidings within the Acton Yard, commencing by a junction with Work No. 3/17A at a point 160 metres north-east of the bridge carrying Noel Road over the Reading Railway, passing eastwards and terminating at a point 155 metres west of the junction of York Road with Horn Lane.
 
 (Submission under Schedule 7 - (Paragraph 9)  Bringing into Use. Crossrail Act 2008)
